attributes.action: Fund Evusheld the preventative COVID19 antibody for immunocompromised
attributes.additional_details: My mum has myeloma - many other people have varying forms of blood cancer - they have not been able to mix with their families without risk for almost 3 years - another winter approaches with more risks of covid - just do the right thing and make this treatment available
attributes.background: Make this treatment available to vulnerable patients in the uk - privately or national health

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611884
